column4: there is 2.6.10 in hoary afaik, you can try and backport it to warty
where do i get it?  do i have to do something special in synaptic/
not really sure, there is backports project for warty http://ubuntu-bp.sourceforge.net/ you can put in a request for kernel 2.6.10, i'll second it since from what i hear 2.6.10 is best 2.6 yet
